segments.text: Steve . Is that you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . What's going on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not much . What a surprise to see you here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . It's been a couple of months since I saw you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What have you been up to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just started working out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Where do you work out at ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I joined the Samsung Health Club last month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you mostly do during your workout ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I concentrate mostly on my legs , chest , arms and stomach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I should start exercising more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard work while exercising , but it is a great feeling when I get done .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a running machine at home . I used to use it , but I already got sick of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exercising at home is hard . The environment is not suited for exercising .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I want to exercise , I will need to join a gym .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a couple of guest passes . You want to check out my health club ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . Let's go over the weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . I'll call you Saturday morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aright . I'll talk to you later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Bye .
segments.speaker: S2
